import React from 'react' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import {addToCart} from "../actions/Cart-actions" import {ProductDivStyle, ProductButtonStyle, PageDiv} from "../styled-components/ProductStyle" export default function ProductInfo(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {product} = props return (

{product.size}

{product.brand} {product.name}

Includes: {product.description}

${product.price}

addToCart(dispatch, product)}>ADD TO CART
) }
